definition: clothes/dress/garment/to serve (in the military, a prison sentence etc)/to obey/to be convinced (by an argument)/to convince/to admire/to acclimatize/to take (medicine)/mourning clothes/to wear mourning clothes
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
post cibum (pharm.)/to take (medicine) after a meal

sentences.english: By then tens of millions of people will have taken ezetimibe.
sentences.chinese: 而那时，数千万的人已经服用了ezetimibe。

sentences.english: Serviceability of 100% wool high-count worsted fabric was improved.
sentences.chinese: 提高纯毛精纺高支纱织物的服用性能。

sentences.english: Did they take their full dose of ribavirin?
sentences.chinese: 他们服用的利巴韦林是否足够？

sentences.english: So how should you take creatine?
sentences.chinese: 因此，肌酸应该如何服用？

sentences.english: The testing results of the fabric are essentially satisfactory in wearability.
sentences.chinese: 并经织物服用性能测试，基本达到满意的效果。

sentences.english: Take one to two caplets daily, preferably with meals.
sentences.chinese: 每日一至二粒，餐后服用更佳。

sentences.english: The present invention is a health-care food with good health-care effects and convenient taking.
sentences.chinese: 是一种保健效果好，服用方便的保健食品。

sentences.english: The development of this condition is directly related to the length of time a patient is taking metoclopramide and the number of doses taken.
sentences.chinese: 病情的进展与患者服用胃复安的时间和剂量成正相关。

sentences.english: How do you respond to questions about performance-enhancing-drug use?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样回答关于运动激素药物服用的问题的？

sentences.english: Take your diabetes meds as prescribed.
sentences.chinese: 按照医生的规定服用糖尿病药物。

sentences.english: Residents of the U. S. do not need to take iodine pills to prevent radiation-induced thyroid cancer.
sentences.chinese: 美国居民无须服用碘片来预防辐射造成的甲状腺癌症。

sentences.english: The experts also said people should take less than4000mg4,000milligrams of acetaminophen in a single day.
sentences.chinese: 专家们认为一天醋酚氨服用量要少于4000毫克。

sentences.english: Those with low blood pressure and hyperchlorhydria are forbidden to drink. When antibiotics are taken, this juice is also forbidden.
sentences.chinese: 低血压及胃酸过多的人士忌用，服用抗生素期间禁用。

sentences.english: Many types begin working right away, but they generally should not be taken for long periods.
sentences.chinese: 有很多都是是马上起效，只是它们通常不能长期服用。

sentences.english: This soup helps to enhance blood circulation. It is a winter delicacy that helps to keep our body warm.
sentences.chinese: 此汤行气活血，特别适合冬天服用，可帮助驱寒保暖。

sentences.english: People usually lose weight quite quickly when they take orlistat.
sentences.chinese: 服用奥利司他胶囊，减肥迅速。

definition: to take medicine orally/oral (contraceptive etc)/to say that one is convinced
to follow the doctor's advice/as instructed by the physician
to take medicine orally (as opposed to applying externally)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
leaf of the iris/variant of 藥|药[yao4]
aspirin (loanword) (variant of 阿司匹林[a1 si1 pi3 lin2])
